group_1.textRight: That was quite the con job.

group_1.textLeft: It really wasâ€¦
I can't believe she's just been calmly baking@sweet potatoes this whole time!
She can be a pain sometimes.

group_1.textRight: And she was the one who brought up@the event...

group_1.textLeft: You're staring so intently. [chara:101700:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101700:cheek_0][chara:101700:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:101700:lipSynch_1]What's caught@your attention?
Oh my. A hiking flyer, is it?
Are you interested in the event?
Hm...? Masara? Something wrong?
Ah, there it is! The first checkpoint!

group_1.textRight: So I guess even the checkpoints with the@quiz questions are hidden.

group_1.textLeft: It looks that way.

group_1.textRight: And there're a lot of questions...
This rally might be tougher than we thought.

group_1.textLeft: You might be right. [chara:301602:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301602:cheek_0][chara:301602:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:301602:lipSynch_1]Let's see here... @Question 1.

group_1.narration: Question 1@You may know the famous "bald eagle."@But "bald parrots" exist as well.@True or False?

group_1.textLeft: *Snort* What? There's no way...
[chara:301602:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?! You're kidding! There are bald@parrots?

group_1.textRight: Yes, they were first identified around@20 years ago.

group_1.textLeft: Why do you know that?

group_1.textRight: It was on a TV show.

group_1.textLeft: Huhhh...
In this group of three people, which one is@being honest?
Um... Hmm...@How do we tackle this one...

group_1.textRight: Questions like this are best approached by@process of elimination...
You need to compare their stories to find@which one is off.

group_1.textLeft: How do we do that?

group_1.textRight: First, let's assume Taro is the honest man.@If he is...

group_1.textLeft: Then Jiro is lying...
But this "Taro is the honest one" statement@is wrong...
And Saburo can't be the honest one either...
So that means the honest man is...[chara:301602:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301602:motion_100][chara:301602:lipSynch_1]Jiro?
Wow, I see now.
[chara:301602:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]*Giggle* You've solved another one, Masara!
I'm no help at all in these quizzes.
Hmm?

group_1.narration: Question 4@There's one in every day,@but only one in a year.@What is it?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:301602:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...Oh!@Y!
The letter! D-A-Y, there's one "Y".@Then in "year", Y-E-A-R, one "Y" again!
[chara:301602:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yaaay! I finally got one before Masara!
